title: Are Asian Elections in 2024 Facing a Crisis of Censorship and AI Manipulation?
description: Internet restrictions, AI-driven disinformation, and mass arrests are casting a shadow over the integrity of upcoming and ongoing major Asian elections in 2024, undermining the democratic process. These threats have intensified ahead of crucial electoral events, with governments exploiting updated media laws to stifle dissent and control information flow, risking the fundamental principles of freedom […]
